description:
16.12 sierpinski
Generate a Sierpinski carpet/triangle fractal, and randomly pan around.

This source accepts the following options:
name: sierpinski

options.description: Set frame size. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual. Default value is "640x480".
options.name: size

options.description: Set frame rate, expressed as number of frames per second. Default value is "25".
options.name: rate

options.description: Set seed which is used for random panning.
options.name: seed

options.description: Set max jump for single pan destination. Allowed range is from 1 to 10000.
options.name: jump

options.description: Set fractal type, can be default carpet or triangle.
options.name: type
